name: 融合教育專題研究
goals: To describe basic elements of inclusion with rigorous research evidence 描述融合的基本元素，並提出實徵研究做為佐證
To identify inclusive/exclusive activities in educational settings 指出在教育場域的融合/排除活動
To provide an overview of educational legislation in Taiwan and identify key international legislations 介紹台灣有關於融合教育的政策以及說明國際相關政策
To provide an overview of historical and contemporary issues, concepts and values in the international field of inclusive education 介紹國際上融合教育在歷史與現今的議題、概念、價值觀演變趨勢。
To apply research strategies in identifying issues and proposing solutions for inclusion 針對融合使用研究策略發現問題、並提出可能的解決方案

methodologies.note:
The class is structured around presentations from the instructor and international scholars who are actively doing research or providing direct supports in inclusive educational settings.
授課教師以及有在進行融合實務或研究的國際學者共同講述相關議題。

Students are expected to come to class prepared to participate with their peers and to demonstrate that you have carefully and critically read all of the assigned material, can offer insights, ask relevant and significant questions. 
Students are encouraged to use English in class. While grammar is not the major focus of this class, the instructor will provide feedback for students to improve when necessary.
學生在上課前必須充分閱讀相關文章，在課堂中與同儕進行討論時展現對議題、文章的分析、並提出批判性的提問。
學生們應以英語交談。雖然文法不是本課程的重點，教師在過程中仍會提出必要的修正，以讓學生進步。

See assessment for more information on research hackathon.
請閱讀評分部分關於研究黑客松的描述。

See assessment for more information on research hackathon.
請閱讀評分部分關於研究黑客松的描述。

In class, we would watch a documentary film entitled “Including Samuel ” and various relevant video clips. Students are expected to discuss guided questions.
課堂中會觀賞一片紀錄片及其他相關影片。學生們可就指引問題進行討論與回答。

grading.note:
UDL lesson plan is a group assignment that requires students to select one lesson plan, focus on two pupils with various abilities, and develop a guideline for accommodations for general education teachers.
UDL教案這份團體作業請學生就之前曾教授過的教案，選定兩位不同能力的學生，撰寫出給普通教室閱讀的課程調整建議。

Attendance will be recorded for all classes and group meetingS. Students are expected to come to class prepared to participate with their peers and to demonstrate that you have carefully and critically read all of the assigned material, can offer insights, ask relevant and significant questions. 
小組討論及課堂參與將會作為出席紀錄參考。學生在上課期間的參與應反應出其課前的準備。

Each student is expected to search online for articles related to inclusive education and prepare a short in-class oral presentation (5 minutes) and a critical reflective one-page paper in English. 
每位學生將在授課教師帶領下選定與融合相關的文章，並準備五分鐘的英語口頭報告、搭配撰寫的一頁英語批判性短文。

Hackathon is an event where groups of students work together on projects for a concentrated period of time. The aim of a hackathon is to bring together students with complementary skills and knowledge to compose a short essay or research plan.
黑客松為一個學生們在短時間聚焦於計畫，以高強度的專注力完成計畫的活動。黑客松的目的在於讓具備有互補技能與知識的學生聚集在一起，在短時間內完成撰寫一篇短文或是研究計畫。

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
